verses.verse: This then <S%H1961>was<s%> the <S%H1486>lot<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> by their <S%H4940>families;<s%> even <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H123>Edom<s%> the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H6790>Zin<s%> <S%H5045>southward<s%> was the uttermost <S%H4480>part<s%> <S%H7097><s%> of the south <S%H8486>coast.<s%>

And their <S%H5045>south<s%> <S%H1366>border<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> from the <S%H4480>shore<s%> <S%H7097><s%> of the <S%H4417>salt<s%> <S%H3220>sea,<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> the <S%H3956>bay<s%> that <S%H6437>looketh<s%> southward: <S%H5045><s%>

And it went <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the south <S%H4480>side<s%> <S%H5045><s%> to <S%H4610>Maaleh-acrabbim,<s%> and passed <S%H5674>along<s%> to <S%H6790>Zin,<s%> and ascended <S%H5927>up<s%> on the south <S%H4480>side<s%> <S%H5045><s%> unto <S%H6947>Kadesh-barnea,<s%> and passed <S%H5674>along<s%> to <S%H2696>Hezron,<s%> and went <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H146>Adar,<s%> and fetched a <S%H5437>compass<s%> to Karkaa: <S%H7173><s%>

From thence it passed <S%H5674>toward<s%> <S%H6111>Azmon,<s%> and went <S%H3318>out<s%> unto the <S%H5158>river<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%> and the goings <S%H8444>out<s%> of that <S%H1366>coast<s%> <S%H1961>were<s%> at the <S%H3220>sea:<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> your <S%H5045>south<s%> <S%H1366>coast.<s%>

And the <S%H6924>east<s%> <S%H1366>border<s%> was the <S%H4417>salt<s%> <S%H3220>sea,<s%> even <S%H5704>unto<s%> the <S%H7097>end<s%> of <S%H3383>Jordan.<s%> And their <S%H1366>border<s%> in the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H6285>quarter<s%> was from the <S%H4480>bay<s%> <S%H3956><s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%> at the uttermost <S%H4480>part<s%> <S%H7097><s%> of Jordan: <S%H3383><s%>

And the <S%H1366>border<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H1031>Beth-hogla,<s%> and passed <S%H5674>along<s%> by the <S%H4480>north<s%> <S%H6828><s%> of <S%H1026>Beth-arabah;<s%> and the <S%H1366>border<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> to the <S%H68>stone<s%> of <S%H932>Bohan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of Reuben: <S%H7205><s%>

And the <S%H1366>border<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> toward <S%H1688>Debir<s%> from the <S%H4480>valley<s%> <S%H6010><s%> of <S%H5911>Achor,<s%> and so <S%H6828>northward,<s%> <S%H6437>looking<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> <S%H1537>Gilgal,<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is <S%H5227>before<s%> the going <S%H4608>up<s%> to <S%H131>Adummim,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is on the south <S%H4480>side<s%> <S%H5045><s%> of the <S%H5158>river:<s%> and the <S%H1366>border<s%> <S%H5674>passed<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H5885>En-shemesh,<s%> and the goings <S%H8444>out<s%> thereof <S%H1961>were<s%> <S%H413>at<s%> En-rogel: <S%H5883><s%>

And the <S%H1366>border<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> by the <S%H1516>valley<s%> of the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2011>Hinnom<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H4480>south<s%> <S%H5045><s%> <S%H3802>side<s%> of the <S%H2983>Jebusite;<s%> the <S%H1931>same<s%> is <S%H3389>Jerusalem:<s%> and the <S%H1366>border<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H7218>top<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> lieth <S%H5921>before<s%> the <S%H1516>valley<s%> of <S%H2011>Hinnom<s%> <S%H3220>westward,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is at the <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of the <S%H7497>giants<s%> northward: <S%H6828><s%>

And the <S%H1366>border<s%> was <S%H8388>drawn<s%> from the <S%H4480>top<s%> <S%H7218><s%> of the <S%H2022>hill<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H4599>fountain<s%> of the <S%H4325>water<s%> of <S%H5318>Nephtoah,<s%> and went <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H6085>Ephron;<s%> and the <S%H1366>border<s%> was <S%H8388>drawn<s%> to <S%H1173>Baalah,<s%> <S%H1931>which<s%> is Kirjath-jearim: <S%H7157><s%>

And the <S%H1366>border<s%> <S%H5437>compassed<s%> from <S%H4480>Baalah<s%> <S%H1173><s%> <S%H3220>westward<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H8165>Seir,<s%> and passed <S%H5674>along<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H3802>side<s%> of <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H3297>Jearim,<s%> <S%H1931>which<s%> is <S%H3693>Chesalon,<s%> on the north <S%H4480>side,<s%> <S%H6828><s%> and went <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H1053>Beth-shemesh,<s%> and passed <S%H5674>on<s%> to Timnah: <S%H8553><s%>

And the <S%H1366>border<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H3802>side<s%> of <S%H6138>Ekron<s%> <S%H6828>northward:<s%> and the <S%H1366>border<s%> was <S%H8388>drawn<s%> to <S%H7942>Shicron,<s%> and passed <S%H5674>along<s%> to <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H1173>Baalah,<s%> and went <S%H3318>out<s%> unto <S%H2995>Jabneel;<s%> and the goings <S%H8444>out<s%> of the <S%H1366>border<s%> <S%H1931>were<s%> at the <S%H3220>sea.<s%>

And the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H1366>border<s%> was to the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3220>sea,<s%> and the <S%H1366>coast<s%> thereof. <S%H2088>This<s%> is the <S%H1366>coast<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families.<s%>

And unto <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3312>Jephunneh<s%> he <S%H5414>gave<s%> a <S%H2506>part<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H413>according<s%> to the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> to <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> <S%H853>even<s%> the <S%H7151>city<s%> of <S%H704>Arba<s%> the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H6061>Anak,<s%> <S%H1931>which<s%> city is <S%H2275>Hebron.<s%>

And <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> <S%H3423>drove<s%> <S%H4480>thence<s%> <S%H8033><s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6061>Anak,<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H8344>Sheshai,<s%> and <S%H289>Ahiman,<s%> and <S%H8526>Talmai,<s%> the <S%H3211>children<s%> of <S%H6061>Anak.<s%>

And he went <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H4480>thence<s%> <S%H8033><s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H1688>Debir:<s%> and the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H1688>Debir<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> was <S%H7158>Kirjath-sepher.<s%>

And <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> He <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H5221>smiteth<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H7158>Kirjath-sepher,<s%> and <S%H3920>taketh<s%> it, to him will I <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H5915>Achsah<s%> my <S%H1323>daughter<s%> to <S%H802>wife.<s%>

And <S%H6274>Othniel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7073>Kenaz,<s%> the <S%H251>brother<s%> of <S%H3612>Caleb,<s%> <S%H3920>took<s%> it: and he <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H853>him<s%> <S%H5915>Achsah<s%> his <S%H1323>daughter<s%> to <S%H802>wife.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> as she <S%H935>came<s%> unto him, that she <S%H5496>moved<s%> him to <S%H7592>ask<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H854><s%> her <S%H1>father<s%> a <S%H7704>field:<s%> and she <S%H6795>lighted<s%> <S%H4480>off<s%> <S%H5921><s%> her <S%H2543>ass;<s%> and <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto her, <S%H4100>What<s%> wouldest thou?

Who <S%H559>answered,<s%> <S%H5414>Give<s%> me a <S%H1293>blessing;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> thou hast <S%H5414>given<s%> me a <S%H5045>south<s%> <S%H776>land;<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> me also <S%H1543>springs<s%> of <S%H4325>water.<s%> And he <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H853>her<s%> the <S%H5942>upper<s%> <S%H1543>springs,<s%> and the <S%H8482>nether<s%> <S%H1543>springs.<s%>
This <S%H2063><s%> is the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families.<s%>

And the <S%H4480>uttermost<s%> <S%H7097><s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> the <S%H1366>coast<s%> of <S%H123>Edom<s%> <S%H5045>southward<s%> <S%H1961>were<s%> <S%H6909>Kabzeel,<s%> and <S%H5740>Eder,<s%> and <S%H3017>Jagur,<s%>
And <S%H7016>Kinah,<s%> and <S%H1776>Dimonah,<s%> and <S%H5735>Adadah,<s%>
And <S%H6943>Kedesh,<s%> and <S%H2674>Hazor,<s%> and <S%H3497>Ithnan,<s%>
Ziph, <S%H2128><s%> and <S%H2928>Telem,<s%> and <S%H1175>Bealoth,<s%>
And <S%H2674>Hazor,<s%> <S%H2675>Hadattah,<s%> and <S%H7152>Kerioth,<s%> and <S%H2696>Hezron,<s%> <S%H1931>which<s%> is <S%H2674>Hazor,<s%>
Amam, <S%H538><s%> and <S%H8090>Shema,<s%> and <S%H4137>Moladah,<s%>
And <S%H2693>Hazar-gaddah,<s%> and <S%H2829>Heshmon,<s%> and <S%H1046>Beth-palet,<s%>
And <S%H2705>Hazarshual,<s%> and <S%H884>Beer-sheba,<s%> and <S%H964>Bizjothjah,<s%>
Baalah, <S%H1173><s%> and <S%H5864>Iim,<s%> and <S%H6107>Azem,<s%>
And <S%H513>Eltolad,<s%> and <S%H3686>Chesil,<s%> and <S%H2767>Hormah,<s%>
And <S%H6860>Ziklag,<s%> and <S%H4089>Madmannah,<s%> and <S%H5578>Sansannah,<s%>

And <S%H3822>Lebaoth,<s%> and <S%H7978>Shilhim,<s%> and <S%H5871>Ain,<s%> and <S%H7417>Rimmon:<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> are <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H8672>nine,<s%> with their villages: <S%H2691><s%>
And in the <S%H8219>valley,<s%> <S%H847>Eshtaol,<s%> and <S%H6881>Zoreah,<s%> and <S%H823>Ashnah,<s%>
And <S%H2182>Zanoah,<s%> and <S%H5873>En-gannim,<s%> <S%H8599>Tappuah,<s%> and <S%H5879>Enam,<s%>
Jarmuth, <S%H3412><s%> and <S%H5725>Adullam,<s%> <S%H7755>Socoh,<s%> and <S%H5825>Azekah,<s%>
And <S%H8189>Sharaim,<s%> and <S%H5723>Adithaim,<s%> and <S%H1449>Gederah,<s%> and <S%H1453>Gederothaim;<s%> <S%H702>fourteen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their villages: <S%H2691><s%>
Zenan, <S%H6799><s%> and <S%H2322>Hadashah,<s%> and <S%H4028>Migdal-gad,<s%>
And <S%H1810>Dilean,<s%> and <S%H4708>Mizpeh,<s%> and <S%H3371>Joktheel,<s%>
Lachish, <S%H3923><s%> and <S%H1218>Bozkath,<s%> and <S%H5700>Eglon,<s%>
And <S%H3522>Cabbon,<s%> and <S%H3903>Lahmam,<s%> and <S%H3798>Kithlish,<s%>
And <S%H1450>Gederoth,<s%> <S%H1016>Beth-dagon,<s%> and <S%H5279>Naamah,<s%> and <S%H4719>Makkedah;<s%> <S%H8337>sixteen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their villages: <S%H2691><s%>
Libnah, <S%H3841><s%> and <S%H6281>Ether,<s%> and <S%H6228>Ashan,<s%>
And <S%H3316>Jiphtah,<s%> and <S%H823>Ashnah,<s%> and <S%H5334>Nezib,<s%>
And <S%H7084>Keilah,<s%> and <S%H392>Achzib,<s%> and <S%H4762>Mareshah;<s%> <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their villages: <S%H2691><s%>
Ekron, <S%H6138><s%> with her <S%H1323>towns<s%> and her villages: <S%H2691><s%>
From <S%H4480>Ekron<s%> <S%H6138><s%> even unto the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> lay <S%H5921>near<s%> <S%H3027><s%> <S%H795>Ashdod,<s%> with their villages: <S%H2691><s%>

Ashdod <S%H795><s%> with her <S%H1323>towns<s%> and her <S%H2691>villages,<s%> <S%H5804>Gaza<s%> with her <S%H1323>towns<s%> and her <S%H2691>villages,<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> the <S%H5158>river<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3220>sea,<s%> and the <S%H1366>border<s%> thereof:
And in the <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> <S%H8069>Shamir,<s%> and <S%H3492>Jattir,<s%> and <S%H7755>Socoh,<s%>
And <S%H1837>Dannah,<s%> and <S%H7158>Kirjath-sannah,<s%> <S%H1931>which<s%> is <S%H1688>Debir,<s%>
And <S%H6024>Anab,<s%> and <S%H851>Eshtemoh,<s%> and <S%H6044>Anim,<s%>
And <S%H1657>Goshen,<s%> and <S%H2473>Holon,<s%> and <S%H1542>Giloh;<s%> <S%H259>eleven<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their villages: <S%H2691><s%>
Arab, <S%H694><s%> and <S%H1746>Dumah,<s%> and <S%H824>Eshean,<s%>
And <S%H3241>Janum,<s%> and <S%H1054>Beth-tappuah,<s%> and <S%H664>Aphekah,<s%>
And <S%H2547>Humtah,<s%> and <S%H7153>Kirjath-arba,<s%> <S%H1931>which<s%> is <S%H2275>Hebron,<s%> and <S%H6730>Zior;<s%> <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their villages: <S%H2691><s%>
Maon, <S%H4584><s%> <S%H3760>Carmel,<s%> and <S%H2128>Ziph,<s%> and <S%H3194>Juttah,<s%>
And <S%H3157>Jezreel,<s%> and <S%H3347>Jokdeam,<s%> and <S%H2182>Zanoah,<s%>
Cain, <S%H7014><s%> <S%H1390>Gibeah,<s%> and <S%H8553>Timnah;<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their villages: <S%H2691><s%>
Halhul, <S%H2478><s%> <S%H1049>Beth-zur,<s%> and <S%H1446>Gedor,<s%>
And <S%H4638>Maarath,<s%> and <S%H1042>Beth-anoth,<s%> and <S%H515>Eltekon;<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their villages: <S%H2691><s%>
Kirjath-baal, <S%H7154><s%> <S%H1931>which<s%> is <S%H7157>Kirjath-jearim,<s%> and <S%H7237>Rabbah;<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their villages: <S%H2691><s%>
In the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> <S%H1026>Beth-arabah,<s%> <S%H4081>Middin,<s%> and <S%H5527>Secacah,<s%>
And <S%H5044>Nibshan,<s%> and the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H5898>Salt,<s%> and <S%H5872>En-gedi;<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their <S%H2691>villages.<s%>

As for the <S%H2983>Jebusites<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H3201>could<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> drive them <S%H3423>out:<s%> but the <S%H2983>Jebusites<s%> <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H584>with<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> at <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>
